attributes.action: Abolish the office of deputy prime minister in relation to John Prescott
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Throughout his office as Deputy Prime Minister, John Prescott has been an embarrassment to politics and the country.  His "initiatives" have invariably ended up dropped, scrapped or voted out at vast expense to the taxpayer. He should have no further powers at all with which to waste or squander the nations resources and should thereafter be limited to a remuneration fitting to his new status.

rejection.details: The Office of the Deputy Prime Minister no longer exists.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
